name: Moblog
author: V.J.Catkick

sections.description:
This is moblog. This widget displays most recent image from your twitter time-line so if you post image (with/without text) onto twitter, the widget automatically pulls its image and display at your blog’s sidebar with fancy frames.

You can select frames from one of mine, but if you want to use your own image, specify filename at option panel and you will see it!

Currently this supports http://snipurl.com, http://twitpic.com and http://movapic.com to pull data from twitter (all those are twitter-based imaging service).

You can select build-in fancy picture frames. Original (your own made) frames are also supported.

More details of this, please visit my site. http://www.vjcatkick.com/?page_id=5775

*special thanks photograph_frame and iphone_frame are created by alfabeat. http://alfabeat.ciao.jp/
sections.installation: Place the widget_recent_commentators.php file in your /wp-content/plugins/ directory and activate through the administration panel, and then go to the widget panel and drag it to where you would like to have it!
